title: Switch on Bigga
creator_credit: Film Australia, Electricity Commission of New South Wales (N.S.W.), Stanley Hawes, Lee Robinson and Australia. Dept. of the Interior. Film Division
brief_description: A unique look at the coming of electric power to a small rural district in NSW and the benefits derived from electricity by the farmer and his family. Includes a country style grand switching on ceremony.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Electricity Commission of New South Wales (N.S.W.), Stanley Hawes, Lee Robinson and Australia. Dept. of the Interior. Film Division
